Geometry Genius

Triangle

Area (A) = 0.5 * b * h

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm

Rectangle

Area (A) = w * l

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm

Parallelogram

Area (A) = b * h

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm

Rhombus

Area (A) = 0.5 * d 1 * d 2

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm

Pentagon

Area (A) = 0.5 * p * b

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm

Ellipse

Area (A) = Π ab

b= 4 cm h= 6 cm
